plot: Puissance De La Foi (The Power of Faith): story of a young-married couple, husband Oscar faces terminal cancer disease and given only 3 months to live. With his life at stakes, family's worries; will Oscar faith in God save him?
title: Puissance De La Foi
plot_es: Puissance De La Foi (The Power of Faith): story of a young-married couple, husband Oscar faces terminal cancer disease and given only 3 months to live. With his life at stakes, family's worries; will Oscar faith in God save him?
plot_en: Puissance De La Foi (The Power of Faith): story of a young-married couple, husband Oscar faces terminal cancer disease and given only 3 months to live. With his life at stakes, family's worries; will Oscar faith in God save him?
